member.summary: A call to a message box with the specified conditions.
member.param: The type of the message to be shown. 0=Information, 1=Warning, 2=Error, 3=Question
The title of the message box window
The text should be displayed in the message
The code of the message, used for debugging purposes
The number and type of buttons. 1=Only OK button, 2=Yes/No buttons, 3=OK/Cancel buttons
member.returns: Returns 1 if clicked OK, or Yes, 0 if clicked No or Cancel
